problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum operations to make all array elements equal by adding to prefixes.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates minimum operations by summing differences between adjacent elements, representing prefix changes.
key_insights: The core idea is that an operation on a prefix affects all elements up to that point.
A change in value between adjacent elements `nums[i]` and `nums[i+1]` necessitates an operation.
The total number of operations is the count of such adjacent value changes.
